properties.entry: SELECT /* com.jihunh.jsp.question.model.QuestionDAO#*/ A.QNA_NO , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_BODY , A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_ID , A.QNA_COUNT , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CREATED_DATE , A.QNA_STATUS , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.QNA_DISPLAY FROM MG_QNA A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY A.QNA_NO DESC
